update t_service_material

SERVICE_OID = #{record.serviceOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RAW_MATERIAL_OID = #{record.rawMaterialOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

MATERIAL_NAME_WD = #{record.materialNameWd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
